oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hank Williams Mother's Best show - #12 - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hank Williams' Mother's Best show, featuring Louis Buck (announcer), Hank Williams (performer, host), Don Helms (performer) and Jerry Rivers (performer) listed as show #12 from series 2 on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Williams; Jerry Rivers; Don Helms
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Louis Buck) -- Opening theme -- Tennessee Border (Hank Williams) -- Hank Williams and Louis Buck talk -- Mother's Best plug (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams introduces Don Helms -- Blue Bonnet Rag (Don Helms) -- Hank Williams talks and introduces the next tune -- Dear Brother (Hank Williams) -- Mother's Best plug (Louis Buck) -- Hank Williams introduces the next tune -- Whistlin' Rufus (Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Closing statement (Hank Williams and Louis Buck) -- Closing theme
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Buck, Louis, 1910-1971; Williams, Hank, 1923-1953; Rivers, Jerry, 1928-; Helms, Don (Guitarist);
